name: Revenge of car
description:
Another Master Piece from the 2D Game creator. this time you are behind the 3D endless car racing in much more detailed gaming experience …

Now it is time to ride a car

Feature:-

  • Fuel system added.
  • Real car sound .
  • Two types control added.
  • Get a power to unlock level.

Requirements :-

  • Minimum internal space required 120mb.
  • Install. Upto lollipop 5.0.2v.

Tips:-

  • Longest you ride ,the more score ,you get.
  • Take a fuel time to time.

Follow us :-

itch.io.

Revenge Of car wiil be updated regularly with your suggestion .Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.

  • " Let's play game"
